org.springframework.web.bind.support

接口 WebBindingInitializer

  • 所有已知实现类:
    ConfigurableWebBindingInitializer

    public interface WebBindingInitializer
    Callback interface for initializing a WebDataBinder for performing data binding in the context of a specific web request.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.5

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 已过时的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void initBinder(WebDataBinder binder)
      Initialize the given DataBinder.
      default void initBinder(WebDataBinder binder, WebRequest request)
      已过时。 
      as of 5.0 in favor of initBinder(WebDataBinder)

    • 方法详细资料

      • initBinder

        void initBinder(WebDataBinder binder)
        Initialize the given DataBinder.
        参数:
        binder - the DataBinder to initialize
        从以下版本开始:
        5.0

      • initBinder

        @Deprecated
default void initBinder(WebDataBinder binder,
                                    WebRequest request)
        已过时。 as of 5.0 in favor of initBinder(WebDataBinder)
        Initialize the given DataBinder for the given (Servlet) request.
        参数:
        binder - the DataBinder to initialize
        request - the web request that the data binding happens within
